page.title: 04Wingate - Industrial Estate
page.content: The{site of Wingate Coliery}was eventually{cleared}by the National Coal Board. Because the closure of the mine caused a{local employment {problem,}the local council decided to used this site to provide{industrial {workshop units}in order to{attract {small companies}to the village. This has proved to be{successful}as all of the{units are now occupied.}The businesses vary from{heavy goods {vehicle repair}to a small{furniture {manufacturer}and an{electrical {appliance workshop. Together the companies have brought approximately{fifty jobs}to the village. There is{still land available on the same site to increase the number of units. The whole village hopes that the{finance}can be found and that the{companies can be found}to occupiy them
